Reviews.Title: You might get white cable.
Reviews.Author: J Rockmiller "Fred"
Reviews.Content: 50/50 chance you may get white cable instead of the listed black cable. Daryl in the warehouse cannot tell the difference between white and black.  They said "what's the difference?" They said "return it then we will refund the cost". They won't exchange it. Sucks if you have a rush job and you have requirements. Also check the 18/2 for continuity because I found a break in the wire after 25 feet.

Reviews.Title: Great quality, even better price!
Reviews.Author: J F
Reviews.Content: I've bought different brands of siamese cable in the past, this is the best cable I've bought for the price. The jacket of the wires doesn't feel cheap and is easy to cut/strip. I terminated about 15 BNC ends with the spool of 500ft and only had 1 that was intermittent, re-made the end and it was all working. I will definitely buy again! I had no issues with the spool in a box, except it didn't pull as easy as other boxes but once you start the pull it comes along easy.

Reviews.Title: Gets the job done.
Reviews.Author: R. Ewing
Reviews.Content: Worked fine. Coax was of sufficient quality though shield braid was sparse. The power wires appear to be a copper clad aluminum, so the are not solid copper. Still works great though. Strips easy with diagonal cutters, kliens, wire strippers. Also, mine came as a reel in the box which is a big plus. I have ordered 6 boxes so far and they have all been black.

Reviews.Title: At least it works
Reviews.Author: Nicolas Shelton
Reviews.Content: Purchased 2 black, received 1 black and 1 white. Job looks bad with white cable across black ceiling. All of the cable worked.

Reviews.Title: Easy to work with
Reviews.Author: Paul Kurtz
Reviews.Content: I like this cable because it's easy to work with and provides a clean install.  I really like the fact that the 18/2 has it's own sheath, which allows me to run it up the power supply as one cable.  I've had used Siamese in the past that wasn't like this, which makes for more work and a sloppier install.  Also, I haven't noticed any interference on the cameras where this was used.

Reviews.Title: Just what I needed.
Reviews.Author: Ray562
Reviews.Content: I didnt even know I could find this cable but I kept looking and sure enough I found it and its exactly what I wanted.Now I know where to look if I need more supplies.I even got my order sooner than I expected.
